name: A Night At Andy's
description:
Andy only wants to have a good time !
Play the game.. or he'll get mad !
Beware ! He may be a clown, but he's definitely not joking !

MINI JAM 83 -  THEME : DREAD
LIMITATION : DICE MUST BE A MECHANIC

CONTROLS :
  • MOUSE : Look Around
  • E  :  Throw Positive Dice
  • A / Q : Throw Negative Dice
  • ESCAPE / P  :  Pause / Unpause the game

Throw dices, white ones add up, black substracts !
Your goal is to get the target number within the time you have...
I'm afraid you can't do more than that, or he'll get mad too..

CREDITS : 
  • Rendy 

If the game feels laggy in your browser, you can download the ZIP !
